short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically log in to hs.fi using aalto.fi-sso

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically forwards all hs.fi addresses to www-hs-fi.libproxy.aalto.fi. This extension doesn't get any credentials, only intercepts requests to https://hs.fi and replaces that part with https://www-hs-fi.libproxy.aalto.fi which redirects you to official Aalto sign in page if you're not already logged in.
